results.name: Signed generalized Fibonacci numbers.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..300
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(-1 - x + 2 x^2 + Sqrt[1 + 6 x + x^2]) / (2 x (1 + x + x^2 - x^3)), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 05 2013 *)
